## NumberTypeSchema interface

Primitive `number` type, with specific scalar type (like `int`<!-- -->, `uint`<!-- -->)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NumberTypeSchema 
```

## Remarks

See: [https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/basic-types.html\#number](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/basic-types.html#number)

Encoding:<br/> - [Varint](https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/docs/encoding#varints)<!-- -->: `int`<!-- -->, `uint`<br/> - Fixed 64 bit: `double`<!-- -->, `bigint`<!-- -->, `bigint64`<!-- -->, `biguint64`
